title: Hotel loyalty program statements and point balances
dataVerified: Member name, account number, point balance, tier status, stay history
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake loyalty statements. Domain binding verifies hotel chain (Marriott Bonvoy, Hilton Honors, IHG). Point balance verification. Prevents point theft claims. Status match documentation.
